Biograph.title: Kai Dove
Biograph.subtitle: Software Engineer
Biograph.description: I am currently pursuing my undergraduate studies at the University of Virginia, with a aspiration to forge a successful career as a software engineer

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: My Introduction
About.description: I am a second-year student majoring in Computer Science at the University of Virginia, pursuing a future in software engineering. In between my studies, I enjoy bringing personal projects to life. Stay connected to track my progress and the innovative projects unfolding along the way.

projects.description: Tools and Technologies used: \nTensorFlow, Python, HTML & CSS
details: Created a streamlined web interface for simple image uploads and quick product identification.
Attained significant benchmarks in accuracy and system performance.
Successfully managed and completed the project individually from March to June 2023.
Identifies products within an impressive average time frame of 1.5 seconds, greatly enhancing the overall efficiency and user satisfaction.

projects.description: Tools and Technologies used: \nUnity3D, JavaScript, Firebase
details: Creation of an immersive tycoon-style mobile app.
Implemented a backend system resulting in efficient data storage and retrieval processes.
Built a in-game currency system that utilizes the back-end system.
Built around the '7 Deadly Sins' theme created from my own creativity.

projects.description: Tools and Technologies used: Uvicorn, Numpy, Python, FastAPI, Tensorflow
details: Employs a variety of layers like Conv2D, MaxPooling2D, and Conv2DTranspose, along with Dropout for regularization.
FastAPI is used for the web backend, allowing for easy deployment and API endpoint creation.
Additional libraries like OpenCV and NumPy are used for image manipulation, while the dependencies are managed with specific version numbers.
